00015 namespace UI {
00016     namespace Dialogs {
00018 
00030         class PluginCreator {
00032 
00035             template <class F> class LoadFunctionHelper {
00036                 public:
00037                     static bool functionPresent(const QString &, QDialog *);
00038             };
00039 
00040             public:
00041 
00042                 virtual ~PluginCreator() { }    
00043 
00045 
00046                 QString libraryName () { return LibraryName; }
00047 
00048             protected:
00049                 bool loadFunction(const QString &, QDialog *);
00050                 bool checkValidity(const QString &, const QString &, QDialog *);
00051 
00052                 bool compile (QString);
00053                 bool link (QString);
00054 
00055             private:
00057                 virtual bool loadFunction() = 0;
00059                 virtual bool functionPresent(const QString &) = 0;
00061                 virtual void writeSource() = 0;
00062 
00063                 QString LibraryName;    
00064         };
00065     }
00066 }
00067 
00068 #include <dlfcn.h>
00069 #include <iostream>
00070 #include <QFile>
00071 #include <QMessageBox>
00072 
00073 namespace UI {
00074     namespace Dialogs {
00076 
00083         template <class F>
00084                 bool PluginCreator::LoadFunctionHelper<F>::functionPresent(
00085                     const QString &libName, QDialog *parent) {
00086             void *handle;
00087             F *f;
00088             const char *error;
00089 
00090             if (!QFile::exists (libName)) {
00091                 QMessageBox::warning (parent, "Error opening library",
00092                                     "Library does not exist: "+libName);
00093                 std::cerr << "Library does not exist: "+libName.toStdString()
00094                         << std::endl;
00095                 return false;
00096             }
00097 
00098             handle = dlopen (libName.toStdString().c_str(), RTLD_LAZY);
00099             if (!handle) {
00100                 QMessageBox::warning (parent, "Error opening library", dlerror());
00101                 return false;
00102             }
00103 
00104             f = (F *)dlsym(handle, "f");
00105 
00106             if (f == NULL) {
00107                 if ((error = dlerror()) != NULL)  {
00108                     QMessageBox::warning (parent, "Error finding function", error);
00109                     abort ();
00110                     return false;
00111                 }
00112             }
00113 
00114             dlclose(handle);
00115 
00116             return true;
00117         }
00118     }
00119 }
00120 #endif
